title: Can Tadej Pogačar Win Everything in 2024? UAE Team Emirates is Planning on It
content:
UAE star is targeting the Giro d'Italia and Tour de France, but it doesn't stop there: 'Tadej will focus on winning his first race of the season, and the last.'

Read the full article at Can Tadej Pogačar Win Everything in 2024? UAE Team Emirates is Planning on It on Velo.
author: ahood
